title: burstfire bootcamp session 2
body: thank you to everyone who came to session 1. next session will be on tuesday 7 may from 7.00pm - 9.00pm nz time. burstfire bootcamp is a place to improve in a productive environment. joining the discord entitles you to free coaching and the opportunity to attend our sessions (also free) where we conduct inhouse scrims, 1v1s, group vod reviews, discussions and essentially anything that will make the players better. everything is completely free. there are no sign ups, no emails required and no ranked restrictions. for more information dm me on discord or just join the server and ask someone else. have a nice day - burstfire#8072
